channel.title: Xurses returning
channel.description:
[size=8pt]I am looking for a client helper, someone who knows the basis, how to change the ip address in client.java and how to compile and change a batch file to you're java version. this person will be able to get admin on my server once i get it up and running.
I will be looking for a full team once I get this up. and will have pictures etc. since this is development and i am on the first stages, i suppose this is where to put this.
this is what we are starting with:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,500947.msg3664621.html#msg3664621[/url]Xurses release by myself.[/url]
Going to clean some of it and I retook the old brokenX client which use to be my base since I messed up the Jframe in the past.
client download: http://up.ht/OLLCYY http://uppit.com/b59e411c502y/BrokenX_Client.7z Port was changed to 80, my noip is xursescontinues.zaptop.org and my ipaddress is 173.245.64.15 if someone can download and or use a premade webclient to check it will be appreciated.[/size]

item.title: Xurses returning
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

haha, if you read what i said, i said you’ll have to know how to do it, i never said it isnt already changed. but i already have it running now and someone tested it for me, putting it on vps and have a few more things to do and then ill update this

Read full topic

item.title: Xurses returning
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

fkn lol, dude if u cant change the ip, u shouldnt even try to start a server. that is hopeless man, that is probably the easiest thing possible

Read full topic
